guided-tour-hint:
Hi there,
new to this?
Let me show you around
formular-side-tour-guide:
This is the form side.
Make sure it is correct
formular-side-tour-guide-candraw: Your form seems to be filled with no errors, lets continue to the drawer side.
crisp-chatbox-tour-guide: If you need anything else, don't be shy to chat with us!
drawer-action-select: Once active, you can move around the drawer or zoom in/out.
drawer-action-line: If selected, you will be able to draw your line segments, update the endpoints, etc.
